title: Code Name: Charmer
alternative_title: Code Name wa Charmer: Psychic School Suspense ; My Code Name Is Charmer ; コードネームはCHARMER ; コードネームはチャーマー
status: Code Name wa Charmer: Psychic School Suspense ; My Code Name Is Charmer ; コードネームはCHARMER ; コードネームはチャーマー
description:
Description :
        Naomi, Makoto, Yuji, and Kaede all have psychic powers of some sort and make up the Supernatural Phenomenon Research Group of their school. They battle the Zeyrey, terrible monsters invisible to most people’s eyes, out to suck the life-energy of humans.  

(From ANN)
